TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResultPropertyCollection extends System.Collections.DictionaryBase

summary.span: 包含 執行個體的屬性。

span.span: Contains the properties of a instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體都類似於執行個體。 instances are similar to instances. 顯著的差異在於擷取其資訊從 Active Directory 網域服務階層每次存取新物件時，而資料中已經提供， 查詢會傳回。The notable difference is that the retrieves its information from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy each time a new object is accessed, whereas the data for the is already available in the that a query returns. 如果您嘗試取得查詢並未指定擷取的屬性，屬性將無法使用。If you try to get a property that your query did not specify for retrieval, the property will not be available.

A that has the specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 C# 中，這個屬性是 類別的索引子。In C#, this property is the indexer for the class. 在 JScript，您可以使用類型，所定義的預設索引屬性，但您無法明確地定義您自己。In JScript, you can use the default indexed properties defined by a type, but you cannot explicitly define your own. 不過，自動在類別上指定 expando 屬性會提供預設索引的屬性，其類型為 Object 時，而且索引類型為。However, specifying the expando attribute on a class automatically provides a default indexed property whose type is Object and whose index type is .
